name: Shoot Shoot My Waifu
description:
This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages, including the following: Partial Nudity, Sexual Content
Characters depicted in this game are over 18 years of age.
After Raphael defeated all 7 demon girls the first 7 Sexy Sins episode,
those demons have fled to hide from him in the human world.
When he got word of their wherabouts, he got excited and started preparing himself
to visit the human world for purification once again.
This time he is going with new forms and more powerful weapons
to vanquish those demons by destroying their sinful display of armor
and clothes one piece at a time.
In this game, you are taking the role of Raphael, the angel who possesses
the photo album of sexy girls from the three worlds.
Your mission is to search for those 7 sins demons
disguised as Waifu's in human world.
Fighting, groaning, dealing with demonic minions,
dodging bullet, and confronting beautiful demon bosses.
Punish them with holy water. Force them to return
to their own form by using pleasuring tools.
And collect new photos of their shameful defeat to your album.
There will be more actions awaiting for you in this new episode!
- Controller: Joystick / Keyboard / Mouse
- 7 sexy demons, and 1 more evil spirit in secret mission
- 8 unique boss fights
- 14 type of minions
- 8 love scenes
- 24 pleasuring tools
- 42 achievements
- 283 armor pieces to destroy!
